Vay theo ha n tin in

M T SN PHM


Note: Vay theo ho n in ch cn ng tn chnh ch, ho n in trn 300 gii ngn nhanh trong ngy khng thm nh nh, h tr Qung Nam, Nng.

Vay theo ha n in tn chp tr gp l mt hnh thc ca vay tn chp ngn hng. Tc ngi i vay khng cn phi c ti sn th chp, khng cn ngi bo lnh vay, m ch cn chng minh c tin in tiu dng hng thng ca mnh.

Da trn c s , ngn hng s xem xt s tin in hng thng m khch hng s dng xem xt v duyt vay theo s tin tng ng. iu kin v h s vay theo ha n in thng rt n gin.

Hin ti Vay tin Nng chp nhn duyt vay tn chp theo ha n in nu khch hng ng tn trn ha n tin in. Mt s ngn hng h tr cho vay nh: Bidv, Agribank, Acb, Vietinbank, Vietcombank, Vpbank, Techcombank, Sacombank, Prudential, Ocenbank, Mb

U IM KHI VAY THEO HA N IN

c vay ln n 60 ln tin in s dng.

c quyn tt ton khon vay khi hon thnh xong 4 k ng ph

IU KIN C VAY


c xt duyt vay tr gp tn chp theo ha n in, khch hng cn p ng c nhng yu cu sau:

  • Tin in >= 250.000 ng/ thng.
  •  Khch hng ng tn t nht 03 thng trn ha n in.

 

LI XUT VAY HIN HNH


Li sut p dng cho sn phm vay theo ha n in ph thuc vo mc s dng in hng thng ca khch hng. Vi nhng khch hng s dng in nhiu s c mc li sut thp hn so vi khch hng s dng in t. c bit, trong thng ny Ngn Hng SHB h tr mc li sut u i hn so vi trc y (Gim 0.05%) c th nh sau:

Tiu ch Khch hng ng tn trn H Khch hng l v hoc chng ca ngi ng tn trn H Khch hng hoc v/chng , ngi c cng huyt thng vi ngi ng tn trn H
M t >= 1.000.000/ thng >= 550.000/ thng >= 250.000/ thng
Li sut 1.66% 2.17% 2.95%


Bng li sut u i p dng thng ny

V d: Vi 1.000.000 ng khch hng ch mt 16.600 ng tin li (Mc li sut 1.66%).

H S VAY YU CU
